name: GroupMe Dark - 2017 Fork
description: A new updated fork of Hasteur's 'Groupme Dark - web fork1' (https://userstyles.org/styles/121880/groupme-dark-web-fork1), which itself is a fork of Aerdan X's original 'Groupme Dark' (https://userstyles.org/styles/107018/groupme-dark).
additional_info: This update includes small tweaks to the layout, and a broad move from the dominant blue colors from previous versions, moving instead towards general dark colors with splashes of highlights for a more consistent and subtle look.  I will most likely continue tweaking the style in the future.  Feel free to send requests or comments my way if you have some.  This is my first style, but I'm going to try to keep it updated and improved as time goes on.  I use the GroupMe web interface daily in my job, so I have no shortage of experience staring at the vanilla design, and I'm hoping I can bring some polish and clean design to the page.
